duties_responsibilities.duty: Welcome every customer and create an environment that is customer focused. Develop and maintain successful relationships with customers.
Maintain a thorough knowledge of our merchandise and demonstrate product expertise during the selling process.
Ensure prompt follow-up on problems, questions, and special orders.
Participate and take an active role in store events and trunk shows.
Ensure that floor is well stocked with merchandise and participate in maintaining the cleanliness and general maintenance of the store.
Understand and represent our brand in a polished and professional manner.
Maintain a positive and professional attitude at all times. Must adhere to Company policies. Must be a team player.
